sentences.chinese: 让她感到惭愧的是，她减掉的体重全又长回来了。

sentences.english: He’s brought shame on the whole family.

to make someone feel ashamed

name: slump
trans: v. （价格、数量等）骤降；重重地坐下（或倒下）；惨败；（肩或脑袋）耷拉着 n. （价格、数量等的）猛然严重下降；经济不景气时期；低潮期

sentences.chinese: 去年销售额骤减 20%。

sentences.chinese: 由于地产价格的暴跌，委员会的土地目前大不如原来所希望的那么值钱了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下降，衰落；倒下；大幅度下降，暴跌

trans: adj. 音乐的；悦耳的 n. 音乐片

sentences.english: a musical version of the fairy tale ‘Cinderella’
sentences.chinese: 童话故事《灰姑娘》的音乐剧版

sentences.english: When he began his musical career, King played only for black audiences.
sentences.chinese: 金在音乐事业的开始阶段只为黑人观众演奏。

detailed_translations.english: relating to music or consisting of music

trans: adj. 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的

sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要再那样看着我了，你让我紧张。

sentences.chinese: 到了面试的时候，我紧张得要命。

detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

name: shook
trans: v. 摇动（shake的过去式） n. 可装配为木箱的各个部件；一捆；（英）禾束堆 adj. 受到严重打击的；心绪不宁的 n. (Shook)人名；(英)舒克

trans: n. 独奏；独唱；独奏曲 adj. 独奏的；独唱的；单独的 vt. 单人攀登；单独驾 vi. 单独表演；放单飞 adv. 单独地

sentences.english: a gorgeous piano solo
sentences.chinese: 一首极其美妙的钢琴独奏曲

sentences.chinese: 他刚刚完成他最后一张个人专辑。

sentences.english: When did you first fly solo?
sentences.chinese: 你第一次单独飞行是什么时候？

sentences.english: a solo effort

sentences.chinese: 独唱专辑

done alone without anyone else helping you

name: stage
trans: n. 阶段；舞台；戏剧；驿站 vt. 举行；上演；筹划 vi. 举行；适于上演；乘驿车旅行 n. (Stage)人名；(英)斯特奇

sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

detailed_translations.english: a particular time or state that something reaches as it grows or develops

sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

trans: n. 观众；听众；读者；接见；正式会见；拜会

sentences.chinese: 这个节目吸引了大约两千万固定观众收看。

sentences.english: Goya was one of the first painters to look for a wider audience for his work.
sentences.chinese: 戈雅是最早为自己的作品寻找更多观赏者的画家之一。

name: character
trans: n. 性格，品质；特性；角色；[计] 字符 vt. 印，刻；使具有特征 n. (Character)人名；(英)克拉克特

sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.chinese: 文例句：她坐在一根大树枝上往下看.

sentences.chinese: 他们是古怪的一对。

sentences.chinese: 他这人有些奇怪。

sentences.chinese: 自以为是、不愿认错的男子

sentences.chinese: 赛思因为有了新跑车而扬扬得意。

sentences.chinese: 别生气，我只是在逗你玩。

sentences.chinese: 观众拼命为他加油。

sentences.chinese: 公司正在裁员以减少开支。

sentences.chinese: 有一段时间她在波士顿开餐馆。

sentences.chinese: 目前伦敦和爱丁堡两地都开设了这些课程。

sentences.chinese: 许多人参加了由雇主管理的养老金计划。

detailed_translations.english: to organize or be in charge of an activity, business, organization, or country

name: hotel

sentences.chinese: 我已订好机票和酒店。

sentences.english: We’ll be staying at the Hotel Ibis.

detailed_translations.english: a building where people pay to stay and eat meals

name: incredible

sentences.chinese: 他跌下去竟然能够生还，真不可思议。

sentences.english: It’s incredible how much Tom has changed since he met Sally.
sentences.chinese: 自从遇见萨莉后，汤姆的变化之大简直令人难以置信。

name: melt

sentences.english: It was warmer now, and the snow was beginning to melt.
sentences.chinese: 现在天气暖和了，雪开始融化。

name: tour

sentences.english: We met on a coach tour in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在意大利乘长途客车旅游时相识的。

sentences.chinese: 警方和贩毒团伙之间的一场激战

name: brave

sentences.chinese: 勇敢的士兵

sentences.english: her brave fight against cancer
sentences.chinese: 她与癌症的勇敢搏斗

sentences.english: He swung the car to the left and that swerve saved Malone's life.
sentences.chinese: 他把车猛转向左边，那一转救了马隆的命。

detailed_translations.english: to make a sudden sideways movement while moving forwards, usually in order to avoid hitting something
Swerve is also a noun

name: balance
trans: n. 平衡；余额；匀称 vt. 使平衡；结算；使相称 vi. 保持平衡；相称；抵销 n. (Balance)人名；(西)巴兰塞

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

name: cartilage
trans: n. 软骨

sentences.english: Andre Agassi has pulled out of next week's Grand Slam Cup after tearing a cartilage in his chest.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈·阿加西胸部软骨拉伤后已退出了下周的大满贯赛事。

detailed_translations.english: a strong substance that can bend, which is around the joints in your body and in your outer ear

name: dinosaur
trans: n. 恐龙；过时、落伍的人或事物

sentences.english: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.chinese: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.english: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

sentences.english: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

detailed_translations.english: one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago

name: shark
trans: n. 鲨鱼；骗子 vi. 诈骗 vt. 敲诈

sentences.english: Sharks were circling around our boat.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼在我们的小船周围游弋。

sentences.english: Beware the sharks when you are making up your mind how to invest.
sentences.chinese: 当你决定如何投资时要提防诈骗者。

detailed_translations.english: a large sea fish with several rows of very sharp teeth that is considered to be dangerous to humans

name: steer
trans: vt. 控制，引导；驾驶 vi. 驾驶，掌舵；行驶 n. 阉牛 n. (Steer)人名；(英)斯蒂尔；(德、匈)施特尔

sentences.english: He was steering with only one hand.
sentences.chinese: 他只用一只手在驾驶。

detailed_translations.english: to control the direction a vehicle is going, for example by turning a wheel

name: confused
trans: adj. 困惑的；混乱的；糊涂的 v. 困惑（confuse的过去式）

name: elder
trans: adj. 年龄较大的；（用于人名前或后，指同名者中）年龄较大的一个；资格老的 n. 长辈，年长者；比……年长的人；（基督教会中的）长老；（部落等群体的）头人，族长；接骨木 n. (Elder) （美）埃德（人名）

sentences.english: Sarah is the elder of the two.
sentences.chinese: 两人当中萨拉年纪较长。

sentences.english: a meeting of the village elders
sentences.chinese: 村里长辈们的集会

detailed_translations.english: the elder of two people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first
a member of a tribe or other social group who is important and respected because they are old

name: erupt
trans: vi. 爆发；喷出；发疹；长牙 vt. 爆发；喷出

sentences.english: Violence erupted after police shot a student during the demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 警察向示威人群中的一名学生开枪，暴乱随之发生。

sentences.english: A political row erupted over the MP’s comments.
sentences.chinese: 这名下院议员的评论引发了一场政治论战。

sentences.english: The volcano erupted in 1980, devastating a large area of Washington state.
sentences.chinese: 这座火山1980年喷发，摧毁了华盛顿州的大片地区。

detailed_translations.english: if fighting, violence, noise etc erupts, it starts suddenly

name: island
trans: n. 岛；岛屿；安全岛；岛状物 adj. 岛的 vt. 孤立；使成岛状 n. (Island)人名；(英)艾兰

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

name: shipshape
trans: adj. 井然有序的；整整齐齐的；整洁干净的 adv. 整齐地；整洁地

sentences.english: Let’s get this house shipshape.
sentences.chinese: 让我们把这所房子收拾干净。

detailed_translations.chinese: 整洁干净的； 井然有序的
detailed_translations.english: neat and clean

name: freedom
trans: n. 自由，自主；直率 n. (Freedom)人名；(英)弗里德姆

sentences.english: People here like their freedom and privacy.
sentences.chinese: 这里的人喜欢他们所拥有的自由与隐私权。

sentences.english: the rights and freedoms of citizens
sentences.chinese: 公民的权利与自由

sentences.english: the freedom to vote
sentences.chinese: 选举自由

sentences.english: He thinks children have too much freedom these days.
sentences.chinese: 他认为如今的孩子太自由了。

detailed_translations.english: the right to do what you want without being controlled or restricted by anyone

name: liberty
trans: n. 自由；许可；冒失 n. (Liberty)人名；(英)利伯蒂

sentences.english: the fight for liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 争取自由和平等的斗争

detailed_translations.english: the freedom and the right to do whatever you want without asking permission or being afraid of authority

name: statue
trans: n. 雕像，塑像 vt. 以雕像装饰

sentences.english: Churchill’s statue stands outside the parliament building.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉尔的塑像矗立在议会大厦外。

sentences.english: A bronze statue was erected in his honour.
sentences.chinese: 人们立了一座铜像纪念他。

detailed_translations.english: an image of a person or animal that is made in solid material such as stone or metal and is usually large

name: tablet
trans: n. 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑 vt. 用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

sentences.english: She took a couple of headache tablets .
sentences.chinese: 她吃了几片头痛药。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑
detailed_translations.english: a small round hard piece of medicine which you swallow

detailed_translations.chinese: 用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

name: torch
trans: n. 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物 vi. 像火炬一样燃烧 vt. 用火炬点燃

sentences.english: We shone our torches around the cavern.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手电筒照着山洞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物
detailed_translations.english: a small electric lamp that you carry in your hand

name: glucose
trans: n. 葡萄糖；葡糖（等于dextrose）

sentences.english: Now, if the insulin "key" cannot open up the cell to glucose, there is something interfering with it.
sentences.chinese: 现在，如果胰岛素这把“钥匙”无法打开细胞让葡萄糖进入，一定是有东西干扰。

sentences.english: Identifying the presence of brown fat is one thing, but activating it to burn more glucose is another.
sentences.chinese: 确定棕色脂肪的存在是一回事，但激活它让它燃烧更多葡萄糖是另一回事。

sentences.english: But refined carbohydrates, such as white bread and white rice, can be very quickly broken down to glucose, the primary fuel for the body.
sentences.chinese: 但是精制的碳水化合物，例如白面包或白米，可以十分迅速地分解为葡萄糖，提供身体最根本的燃料；

detailed_translations.english: a natural form of sugar that exists in fruit

name: homemade
trans: adj. 自制的，家里做的；国产的

sentences.english: homemade cake
sentences.chinese: 自制的蛋糕

detailed_translations.english: made at home and not bought from a shop

name: ingredient
trans: n. 原料；要素；组成部分 adj. 构成组成部分的

sentences.english: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.english: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

detailed_translations.english: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish

name: strain
trans: n. 张力；拉紧；负担；扭伤；血缘 vi. 拉紧；尽力 vt. 拉紧；滥用；滤去；竭力 n. (Strain)人名；(英)斯特兰 n. （植物、动物的）品种；种类

sentences.english: I’ve strained a muscle in my leg.
sentences.chinese: 我的腿有一处肌肉拉伤。

sentences.english: You’ll strain your eyes trying to read in this light.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的光线下看书会伤眼睛的。

detailed_translations.english: to injure a muscle or part of your body by using it too much or making it work too hard
to try very hard to do something using all your strength or ability

name: sugary
trans: adj. 含糖的；甜的；糖状的；甜言蜜语的

sentences.english: sugary foods
sentences.chinese: 含糖食品

detailed_translations.english: containing sugar, or tasting like sugar

name: built
trans: v. 建造，建立；逐步增强；把……嵌入（墙壁、物体等）（build 的过去式和过去分词） adj. 有……体格的；身段优美的；……建成的

name: family
trans: n. 家庭；亲属；家族；子女；[生]科；语族；[化]族 adj. 家庭的；家族的；适合于全家的

sentences.english: Do you know the family next door?
sentences.chinese: 你认识隔壁那家人吗？

sentences.english: The Webb family still has its farm over there.
sentences.chinese: 韦伯家依然保留着那里的农场。

sentences.english: The family now live in London.
sentences.chinese: 那家人现居伦敦。

sentences.english: This house isn’t big enough for a family of seven.
sentences.chinese: 这房子住不下七口之家。

sentences.english: My family come from Scotland originally.
sentences.chinese: 我祖籍是苏格兰。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who are related to each other, especially a mother, a father, and their children

name: farmer
trans: n. 农夫，农民 n. (Farmer)人名；(英)法默；(法)法尔梅；(西)法梅尔

sentences.english: She dickered with the farmer for the best fruit.
sentences.chinese: 她要买最好的水果而跟农民讨价还价。

sentences.english: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.
sentences.chinese: 那个农民挨家挨户兜售他的水果。

sentences.english: As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.
sentences.chinese: 作为农民，你应该学会怎样把一对牛用轭连起来。

name: grocer
trans: n. 杂货店；食品商

sentences.english: The cook and the grocer haggled over the price of eggs.
sentences.chinese: 厨师和杂货商为蛋价计较个没完。

sentences.english: He never overcharged when I went shopping in his grocer.
sentences.chinese: 我去他的杂货店买东西时他从不向我乱索价。

sentences.english: Just as our exchanges with the local grocer free us from backbreaking farm work, so do imports from around the world move us even more toward the very economic specialization that enriches us.
sentences.chinese: 就好像我们与当地的杂货店交易，我们就不用非常辛苦地从事农业劳动，来自全世界的进口品让我们更快地走向经济专业化，使我们富裕。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or works in a shop that sells food and other things used in the home

name: supply
trans: n. 供给，补给；供应品 vt. 供给，提供；补充 vi. 供给；替代

sentences.english: The nation’s fuel supplies will not last forever.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

sentences.english: To protect the food supply , the government ordered the slaughter of affected cattle.
sentences.chinese: 为保护食品供应，政府下令宰杀被感染的牛。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that is available to be used

name: Thanksgiving
trans: n. 感恩

sentences.english: He said sometimes they would invite some friends to share the happiness of Thanksgiving Day.
sentences.chinese: 他说有时候他们也会邀请一些朋友来一起分享感恩节快乐。

sentences.english: I hear about these people every Thanksgiving, then never think about them again for the next 364 days.
sentences.chinese: 我在每个感恩节都听说过这群人，而后在接下来的364天，就再也没有想起过他们。

sentences.english: It compares with "Cyber Monday" in the US - the day after Thanksgiving marketed as a big online shopping day.
sentences.chinese: 它与“网络星期一”在美国，感恩节后的第一天销售作为一个大型网上购物一天。

detailed_translations.english: a public holiday in the US and in Canada when families have a large meal together to celebrate and be thankful for food, health, families etc

name: funnel
trans: n. 漏斗；漏斗状物；烟囱 v. （使）流经狭窄空间；通过漏斗将……导入；（使）通过漏斗般输送；形成漏斗状；（使）汇集，传送

sentences.english: ...a ship with three masts and two funnels.
sentences.chinese: …一艘有3根桅杆和2个烟囱的轮船。

detailed_translations.english: a thin tube with a wide top that you use for pouring liquid into a container with a narrow opening, such as a bottle

detailed_translations.chinese: 通过漏斗或烟囱等；使成漏斗形

name: moist
trans: adj. 潮湿的；多雨的；含泪的 n. 潮湿

sentences.english: Make sure the soil is moist before planting the seeds.
sentences.chinese: 播种之前要确保土壤湿润。

sentences.english: a rich, moist chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 香浓软润的巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: warm moist air
sentences.chinese: 温暖湿润的空气

sentences.english: Her eyes were moist (= she was almost crying ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的眼睛湿润了。

detailed_translations.english: slightly wet, especially in a way that is pleasant or suitable

name: strike
trans: v. 撞击；打；踢（球等）；突击；罢工；使打动；侵袭；突然想到；照射；击出（火星）；擦（火柴）；触发（电弧）；鸣；弹奏；开采出；行进；铸造（硬币）；（电影摄影术）复刻；达到（平衡）；（金融）结算；闯出新的事业；撤（营）；给……印象；把……迷住；摆出（姿态） n. 罢工；抗拒；袭击；殴打；（体育中得分的）击球；（十柱保龄球）一投全倒；（尤指石油的）发现；打击；（对上钩的鱼）急拉钓线；（投球）未击中；（投出的）好球；败坏名声的事 n. (Strike) （美、俄、秘）斯特赖克（人名）

sentences.english: The government has promised that the army will be called in to help if there is a firemen’s strike.
sentences.chinese: 政府承诺，如消防员罢工，就将调军队来协助。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time when a group of workers deliberately stop working because of a disagreement about pay, working conditions etc

name: tornado
trans: n. [气象] 龙卷风；旋风；暴风；大雷雨 n. (Tornado)人名；(西)托纳多

sentences.english: The tornado rubbished the whole village.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风毁掉了整个村庄。

sentences.english: The tornado disrupted broadcasting along the entire coast.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风使整个沿海的广播都中断了。

sentences.english: The tornado is coming, so we had better batten down the hatches here and get to the cellar.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风即将来临，因此我们最好把这里的舱口封上，到地下室去。

detailed_translations.english: an extremely violent storm consisting of air that spins very quickly and causes a lot of damage

name: cable car
trans: （美）缆车

sentences.english: "No cable car, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “没有缆车的。” 他说。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that hangs from a moving cable, and is used to take people up and down mountains

name: mango
trans: n. [园艺] 芒果 n. (Mango)人名；(阿拉伯、意、肯)曼戈；(日)万五 (名)

sentences.english: Peel, stone, and dice the mango.
sentences.chinese: 把芒果削皮、去核、切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: a tropical fruit with a thin skin and sweet yellow flesh

name: Olympics
trans: n. 奥林匹克运动会 奥林匹克运动会的

name: stadium
trans: n. 体育场；露天大型运动场

sentences.english: the new Olympic Stadium
sentences.chinese: 新的奥林匹克体育场

detailed_translations.chinese: 体育场；露天大型运动场
detailed_translations.english: a building for public events, especially sports and large rock music concerts, consisting of a playing field surrounded by rows of seats

name: curb
trans: n. 抑制；路边；勒马绳 vt. 控制；勒住

sentences.english: measures to curb the spread of the virus
sentences.chinese: 控制病毒扩散的措施

detailed_translations.english: to control or limit something in order to prevent it from having a harmful effect

detailed_translations.chinese: 控制， 约束； 路缘
detailed_translations.english: an influence which helps to control or limit something

name: football
trans: n. 足球，橄榄球 vi. 踢足球；打橄榄球

sentences.english: Which football team do you support?
sentences.chinese: 你支持哪个球队？

sentences.english: kids playing football in the street
sentences.chinese: 在街上踢球的小孩子

sentences.english: My Dad took me to watch my first football match .
sentences.chinese: 爸爸带我去看了我人生第一场足球比赛。

sentences.english: a football club
sentences.chinese: 足球俱乐部

detailed_translations.english: a game played by two teams of eleven players who try to kick a round ball into the other team’s  goal

name: pass
trans: v. 通过，经过；沿某方向前进；使达到（某位置）；传递；传球；遗留给；超过；变化；推移；度过；终止；及格；经表决通过（法律等）；允许；宣布；过；排泄；流通；放弃 n. 及格；经过；通行证；道路，山口；传球；飞跃；阶段；鱼道；（桥牌）不叫；（击剑中的）戳刺；变戏法；（计算机）一次浏览 n. (Pass) （德、英）帕斯（人名）

sentences.english: The crowd parted to let the truck pass.
sentences.chinese: 人群分开让卡车通过。

sentences.english: He gave me a smile as he passed.
sentences.chinese: 他经过时对我微笑了一下。

sentences.english: We passed a group of students outside the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 我们在戏院外从一群学生身旁经过。

sentences.english: I pass the sports centre on the way to work.
sentences.chinese: 我上班的路上经过体育中心。

sentences.english: The road passes right through the town centre.
sentences.chinese: 那条路正好穿过镇中心。

sentences.english: We passed the winter pleasantly enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们相当愉快地度过了那个冬季。

detailed_translations.english: to come up to a particular place, person, or object and go past them

name: punt
trans: n. 踢悬空球；平底船；下赌注者 vt. 推掉工作; 踢悬空球 vi. 弃踢；撒手不干；乘方头平底船；下赌注 n. (Punt)人名；(南非)蓬特

name: beaver
trans: n. 海狸；海狸皮毛 n. (Beaver)人名；(英)比弗

sentences.english: ...a coat with a huge beaver collar.
sentences.chinese: …一件带有大海狸毛皮领的大衣。

detailed_translations.english: a North American animal that has thick fur and a wide flat tail, and cuts down trees with its teeth

name: colony
trans: n. 殖民地；移民队；种群；动物栖息地

sentences.english: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

detailed_translations.english: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away

name: dam
trans: n. 10米（等于 decametre）；水坝；水库；（牙科手术中的）橡皮障；母畜，母兽 v. 筑坝；阻止，控制 n. (Dam) （美）丹（人名）

sentences.english: They built a dam along the seashore to retain the seawater.
sentences.chinese: 他们沿海岸筑起一道堤坝以拦住海水。

detailed_translations.english: to stop the water in a river or stream from flowing by building a special wall across it

sentences.chinese: 一座关押战俘的建筑物

detailed_translations.english: a place where goods are sold to the public. In British English, a store is large and sells many different things, but in American English, a store can be large or small, and sell many things or only one type of thing.

trans: n. 工厂；制造厂；代理店

sentences.chinese: 汽车制造厂

sentences.chinese: 工厂工人

detailed_translations.english: a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines

sentences.chinese: 我们要在墨西哥证明这一点。

sentences.chinese: 美国的南面与墨西哥接壤。

sentences.chinese: 除一人外，其他死亡患者都在疾病爆发的中心地墨西哥。

name: cage

detailed_translations.english: to put or keep an animal or bird in a cage

trans: vt. 决定；解决；判决 vi. 决定，下决心

sentences.chinese: 经过长时间的讨论，他们决定选那位较年长的求职者。

detailed_translations.english: to make a choice or judgment about something, especially after considering all the possibilities or arguments

name: opinion
trans: n. 意见；主张

sentences.chinese: 你对凯茜的看法如何？

detailed_translations.english: your ideas or beliefs about a particular subject

name: playmate
trans: n. 玩伴；游伴

sentences.chinese: 这个小女孩喜欢和她的玩伴们一起玩。

sentences.english: It’s a good idea to do some research before you buy a house.
sentences.chinese: 买房子之前作些了解，这想法很对。

sentences.english: He’s been researching material for a documentary.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在研究材料，准备做一个纪录片。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of finding information about something that you are interested in or need to know about
to study a subject in detail, especially in order to discover new facts or test new ideas

sentences.chinese: 昨晚发生了一件非常奇怪的事。

sentences.chinese: 他是个古怪的家伙。

sentences.chinese: 他们出售各种稀奇古怪的产品。

detailed_translations.english: very strange and unusual, and difficult to understand or explain

name: bury
trans: vt. 埋葬；隐藏 n. (Bury)人名；(法)比里；(英、西)伯里；(德、意、罗、波、捷、匈)布里；(俄)布雷

sentences.chinese: 电缆埋在街道的下面。

detailed_translations.english: to put someone who has died in a  grave

detailed_translations.chinese: (Bury)人名；(法)比里；(英、西)伯里；(德、意、罗、波、捷、匈)布里；(俄)布雷

sentences.chinese: 这种关系对我一直都很重要，失去它让我感到难过而空虚。

sentences.chinese: 我为朱莉的婚姻处于破裂的边缘感到难过。

sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不明白。你能再解释一遍吗？

sentences.chinese: 那女人口音很重，我听不懂她在说些什么。

sentences.chinese: 他把家迁到澳大利亚。

sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队掷币获胜，要求英格兰队首先击球。

sentences.chinese: 一个钱袋

name: Tasmania

sentences.english: The next partial eclipse of the sun will occur on Nov. 25, 2011, but it will only be visible from Antarctica, Tasmania, New Zealand and southern South Africa.

sentences.chinese: 我们在圣诞节时交换礼物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送

sentences.chinese: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

name: nature
trans: n. 自然；性质；本性；种类 n. (Nature)人名；(法)纳蒂尔

sentences.english: We grew up in the countryside, surrounded by the beauties of nature.
sentences.chinese: 我们在乡村长大，周围是美丽的大自然。

sentences.english: nature conservation
sentences.chinese: 自然保护

sentences.english: Disease is nature’s way of keeping the population down.
sentences.chinese: 疾病是大自然控制人口的方法。

sentences.english: I tried appealing to his better nature (= his feelings of kindness ) but he wouldn’t agree to help us.
sentences.chinese: 我想唤起他的善良本性，但他就是不同意帮助我们。

sentences.english: Capitalist society is by its very nature unstable.
sentences.chinese: 从本质而言，资本主义社会是不稳定的。

detailed_translations.english: everything in the physical world that is not controlled by humans, such as wild plants and animals, earth and rocks, and the weather

name: daily
trans: adj. 日常的；每日的 n. 日报；朝来夜去的女佣 adv. 日常地；每日；天天 n. (Daily)人名；(英)戴利

sentences.english: daily flights to Miami
sentences.chinese: 每日飞往迈阿密的航班

sentences.english: China Daily receives dispatches from all parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 《中国日报》收到世界各地发来的电讯。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done every day
a newspaper that is printed and sold every day, or every day except Sunday

name: earplug
trans: n. （防噪音或防水的）耳塞；（戴在耳垂上的）耳饰

sentences.english: The earplug is moved from ear to ear to indicate the current date.
sentences.chinese: 移动耳塞用来指示相应的日期。

sentences.english: When go into workshop please ware the safety helmet , safety glasses and earplug , and ware the respirator if necessarily .
sentences.chinese: 进入车间必须确保佩戴安全帽、防护眼镜、耳塞，必要时使用口罩。

sentences.english: Our dog almost died, I learned a new language, I made new friends, I solved new problems, and I got an earplug stuck in my ear. You know, the usual stuff when you travel.
sentences.chinese: 我们的狗都快死了，我学会了一种新的语言，认识了新的朋友，解决了各种新问题，塞上了耳塞——一些旅行时就会有的事。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of rubber that you put inside your ear to keep out noise or water

name: gutter
trans: n. 排水沟；槽；贫民区 vi. 流；形成沟 vt. 开沟于…；弄熄 adj. 贫贱的；粗俗的；耸人听闻的 n. (Gutter)人名；(罗)古特尔；(英)格特

sentences.english: The gutters were blocked and overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 排水沟堵住了，水都溢出来了。

detailed_translations.english: the low part at the edge of a road where water collects and flows away

detailed_translations.chinese: 贫贱的；粗俗的；耸人听闻的

name: shoo
trans: int. 嘘（赶走鸟等时所发声音） v. 发出嘘声将……赶走

name: woodpecker
trans: n. [鸟] 啄木鸟

sentences.english: A woodcutter and a woodpecker lived in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 森林里居住着一个樵夫和一个啄木鸟。

sentences.english: Of course, it took years for the Army to hit on a workable strategy for the woodpecker — a lesson that is informing its conservation work today.
sentences.chinese: 当然，拿出一套对保护啄木鸟行之有效的方案，军方花了几年的功夫 ---- 这对于今天的生态保护工作不失为是一个教训。

sentences.english: Savour the silence, if that's what nature serves up, or thrill to the tap-tap of the woodpecker.
sentences.chinese: 如果这是大自然奉上的一份佳肴，给这份宁静加点作料吧，或是因为啄木鸟的叩击声而兴奋起来吧。

detailed_translations.english: a bird with a long beak that it uses to make holes in trees
